mapper.insert: insert into graduates (name, faculty_id, subject_id, department_id, city, company, is_deleted, create_time, create_by) values (#{name}, #{facultyId}, #{subject}, #{departmentId}, #{city}, #{company}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{createBy})
mapper.select: select id, name, faculty_id, subject_id, department_id, city, company, is_deleted, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from graduates where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update graduates set name = #{name}, faculty_id = #{facultyId}, subject = #{subject}, department_id = #{departmentId}, city = #{city}, company = #{company}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_by = #{createBy} where id = #{id}
